attributes.action: Better Regulation of Insurance company premiums and how they are calculated.
attributes.additional_details:
Every year you earn another years No Claims Discount/Bonus. Every year either your renewal notice as gone through the roof until you call your provider and tell them, or you go on a comparison site and the same provider is now somehow cheaper than before or just in general you premiums go up and up and up.

Will it ever stop, its always down to "there must have been more accidents in your area or maybe more accident in your age group or car type" the point is YOU HAVEN'T BUT YOU MUST PAY EXTRA.
attributes.background: UK Drivers, Homeowner and anyone else who requires insurance to are getting a raw deal. The way premiums are calculated are completely unfair for the reasonable law abiding and safe drivers of this country we are paying through the nose through NO fault of our own.
